00024 #include "Stats.hpp"
00025 #include "utility/misc/unit.hpp"
00026 #include <iostream>
00027 
00028 
00029 using namespace std;
00030 using namespace pwiz::util;
00031 using namespace pwiz::math;
00032 
00033 
00034 ostream* os_ = 0;
00035 
00036 
00037 void test()
00038 {
00039     Stats::vector_type a(2);
00040     a(0) = 1;
00041     a(1) = 2;
00042 
00043     Stats::vector_type b(2);
00044     b(0) = 3;
00045     b(1) = 4;
00046 
00047     Stats::vector_type c(2);
00048     c(0) = 5;
00049     c(1) = 6;
00050 
00051     Stats::data_type data;
00052     data.push_back(a);
00053     data.push_back(b);
00054     data.push_back(c);
00055 
00056     Stats stats(data);
00057     if (os_) *os_ << "mean: " << stats.mean() << endl;    
00058     if (os_) *os_ << "covariance: " << stats.covariance() << endl;
00059 
00060     // mean & covariance computed using good old-fashioned reckoning 
00061     Stats::vector_type mean(2);
00062     mean(0) = 3;
00063     mean(1) = 4;
00064     Stats::matrix_type covariance(2,2);
00065     covariance(0,0) = covariance(0,1) = covariance(1,0) = covariance(1,1) = 8/3.;
00066 
00067     // verify results
00068     const double epsilon = 1e-12;
00069     unit_assert_vectors_equal(stats.mean(), mean, epsilon);
00070     unit_assert_matrices_equal(stats.covariance(), covariance, epsilon); 
00071 
00072     double rms0_good = sqrt(35./3);
00073     double rms1_good = sqrt(56./3);
00074     double rms0_test = sqrt(stats.meanOuterProduct()(0,0));
00075     double rms1_test = sqrt(stats.meanOuterProduct()(1,1));
00076     unit_assert_equal(rms0_test, rms0_good, epsilon);
00077     unit_assert_equal(rms1_test, rms1_good, epsilon);
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00082 {
00083     try
00084     {
00085         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00086         if (os_) *os_ << "StatsTest\n";
00087         test(); 
00088         return 0;
00089     }
00090     catch (exception& e)
00091     {
00092         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00093         return 1;
00094     }
00095 }
